XXsabhivpu:287: Svp_139 ātmajaṃ taṃ samālokya suvarṇam abhisundaraṃ /
XXsabhivpu:289: Svp_140 janako' pi tam ālokya vijño 'yaṃ hi bhaved api /
XXsabhivpu:290: iti matvā ciraṃ paśyans tasthau saṃharṣitāśayaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:291: Svp_141 tataḥ sa janakas tasya kṛtvā jātimahaṃ svayaṃ /
XXsabhivpu:292: nāmāsya kiṃ kariṣye 'ham iti dhyātvaivam abravīt //
XXsabhivpu:293: Svp_142 yat sabhāyāṃ prajāto 'yaṃ tenāsya nandanasya me /
XXsabhivpu:294: sabhika iti vikhyātaṃ nāma bhavatu sarvataḥ //
XXsabhivpu:295: Svp_143 ity ākhyāya pitā tasya dārakasya yathārthataḥ /
XXsabhivpu:297: Svp_144 tataḥ sa dārako mātrā pitrāpi saṃprapālitaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:299: Svp_145 tataḥ sa sabhiko dhīmān aśikṣata lipīḥ kramāt /
XXsabhivpu:301: Svp_146 evaṃ sa vādijid vijñaḥ sarvavidyāvicakṣaṇaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:305: Svp_148 yasya mātā mahāprājñā vidyākaraḥ pitā tathā /
XXsabhivpu:307: Svp_149 tataḥ sa mānino jetuṃ samudrāntika āśrame /
XXsabhivpu:309: Svp_150 tatra sa vādinaḥ sarvān sarvaśāstrapravādite /
XXsabhivpu:311: Svp_151 tato 'nyatrāśrame gatvā sa sabhiko vyalokayat /
XXsabhivpu:312: tathā pravādinaḥ sarvāñ jitvā jayaṃ samāyayau //
XXsabhivpu:313: Svp_152 evaṃ sa sabhiko gatvā ṣoḍaśanagareṣv api /
XXsabhivpu:319: Svp_155 tad ahaṃ tasya munīndrasya jagacchāstur mahāmateḥ /
XXsabhivpu:321: Svp_156 jetuṃ na śakyate buddhaḥ kṣatriyātmaja eva saḥ /
XXsabhivpu:322: raṇakāle tu vīrās te kṣatriyāḥ śāstravaimukhāḥ //
XXsabhivpu:323: Svp_157 vidyākaro mama pitā mahādhīr jananī punaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:325: Svp_138 iti sa sabhiko dhyātvā vārāṇasyāṃ jināśrame /
XXsabhivpu:328: dadarśa sa munīndraṃ taṃ pūrṇendum iva bhāskaraṃ //
XXsabhivpu:329: Svp_160 taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mahāmānī vismayākrāntamānasaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:331: Svp_161 tato dhairyaṃ samālambya madamānaṃ vihāya saḥ /
XXsabhivpu:333: Svp_162 tatra sa samupāśritya tasya śāstur mahāmuneḥ /
XXsabhivpu:335: Svp_163 tatra sa suprasannātmā sāñjaliḥ sa puraḥ sthitaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:336: saṃbuddhaṃ taṃ mahābhijñaṃ saṃpaśyann evam abravīt //
XXsabhivpu:337: Svp_164 bhagavans tad vijānīyād yadarthe 'ham ihāvraje /
XXsabhivpu:338: tad bhavān me manovāñchāṃ saṃpūrayitum arhati //
XXsabhivpu:339: Svp_165 iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sa bhagvāñ jinaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:340: taṃ sabhikaṃ samālokya vihasann evam ādiśat //
XXsabhivpu:341: Svp_166 śṛṇu sādho mahābhāga yadarthe tvam ihāgataḥ /
XXsabhivpu:343: Svp_167 ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa sabhiko mudā /
XXsabhivpu:344: bhagavantaṃ tam ālokya sāñjalir evam abravīt //
XXsabhivpu:345: Svp_168 bhagavan bhavatā prāptaṃ kiṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ ca te vrataṃ /
XXsabhivpu:346: yat saṃbuddho bhavān khyāta etad ādeṣṭum arhati //
XXsabhivpu:347: Svp_169 iti tat prārthitaṃ śrutvā sarvamānimadāpahaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:348: bhagavān sabhikaṃ drṣṭvā tad uttaram upādiśat //
XXsabhivpu:349: Svp_170 uttaraṃ pratipṛcchasva tadarthaṃ sabhika madī /
XXsabhivpu:351: Svp_171 iti sarvajñavacanaṃ śrutvā sabhika mānikaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:352: nirmada uttaraṃ vijñaṃ papraccha sāñjaliḥ smitaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:353: Svp_172 bhagavatājñapitas tvaṃ tadarthaṃ me samādiśa /
XXsabhivpu:357: Svp_174 bodhicaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā saṃprāpya bodhim uttamāṃ /
XXsabhivpu:358: saṃbodhayati yaḥ sarvaṃ sa saṃbuddho nigadyate //
XXsabhivpu:359: Svp_175 mārāśrayaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktvā niṣkleśo vijitendriyaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:362: saddharmaśrāvakaḥ saṃghaḥ sa yogī yatir ucyate //
XXsabhivpu:367: Svp_179 ity uttareṇa saṃdiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa sabhikaḥ punaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:368: sāścarya uttaraṃ vijñaṃ praṇatvā ca nyavedayat //
XXsabhivpu:369: Svp_180 uttarabrāhmaṇāḥ ke ca snātakāś ca kathaṃ dvijāḥ /
XXsabhivpu:370: vaidikāś ca kathaṃ viprāḥ śrotriyāś cāpi te kathaṃ //
XXsabhivpu:371: Svp_181 kṣetrajñāś ca kathaṃ te 'pi kathaṃ ca brahmacārinaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:372: ṛṣayaś ca parivrājā munayaś ca tapasvinaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:373: Svp_182 yatayo yoginaś cāpi kathaṃ kenāpi karmataḥ /
XXsabhivpu:374: etat karma samākhyāya saṃbodhayatu me manaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:375: Svp_183 iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena uttaro viprabhikṣukaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:376: taṃ sabhikaṃ samālokya vihasann evam ādiśat //
XXsabhivpu:377: Svp_184 ye ca śuddhātmano 'hiṃsā dharmāśritās tapasvinaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:379: Svp_*184A* sādhu śṛṇu samādhāya yad etat praṣṭum icchasi /
XXsabhivpu:380: tat te mano'bhituṣṭaye vakṣyāmy ahaṃ samāsataḥ //
XXsabhivpu:381: Svp_*184B* yo viśvaṃ sṛjati brahmā svayaṃbhūr vedabhṛd vidhiḥ /
XXsabhivpu:385: Svp_186 snātvā tīrtheṣu nityaṃ ye śuddhaśīlā jitendriyāḥ /
XXsabhivpu:386: brahmavrataṃ carantas te niṣkāṃkṣāḥ snātakāḥ smṛtāḥ //
XXsabhivpu:388: brahmacaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā carante te dvijāḥ smṛtāḥ //
XXsabhivpu:391: Svp_189 ye brahmasaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā saṃcarantaḥ sadā śubhe /
XXsabhivpu:392: sadvidheḥ pūrayanty arthaṃ te viprāḥ kathitā budhaiḥ //
XXsabhivpu:395: Svp_191 sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ yat kṣetram ātmā samāśrayet /
XXsabhivpu:396: tadviśuddhiṃ vijānīte sa tu kṣetrajña ucyate //
XXsabhivpu:401: Svp_194 ye ca brahmasamācārā mahāsatvā mahardhikāḥ /
XXsabhivpu:405: Svp_196 nirapekṣāḥ svakāye 'pi ye carante tapovrataṃ /
XXsabhivpu:413: Svp_200 etat svalpatarārthe 'pi kathaṃ na jñāyate tvayā /
XXsabhivpu:415: Svp_201 mānaṃ tyaja tvaṃ sabhika bhajainaṃ śāstrapāragaṃ /
XXsabhivpu:417: Svp_202 ity uktvā nijavṛttāntaṃ kathayāmāsa vistaraṃ /
XXsabhivpu:419: Svp_203 ayam eva trilokeṣu sarvavidyādhipaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXsabhivpu:422: Svp_205 etādṛśasya sarvajñasya darśane śravaṇe punaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:423: kā kathā cara tasmāt tvaṃ śāsane 'sya susaṃvaraṃ //
XXsabhivpu:424: Svp_206 ity uttaragiraṃ śrutvā sabhikaḥ so 'tisāhasaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:426: Svp_*206* iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
XXsabhivpu:428: Svp_207 tataḥ sa sabhiko vijñaḥ saṃbuddhaguṇalālasaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:429: taṃ munīndraṃ mudā natvā sāñjalir evam abravīt //
XXsabhivpu:432: Svp_209 tvam eva bhagavān nāthaḥ sarvadharmādhipo jinaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:437: yad ahaṃ bhagavan pātuṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ samutsahe //
XXsabhivpu:438: Svp_212 tad bhavān māṃ samālokya samanvāhartum arhati /
XXsabhivpu:440: Svp_213 dhṛtvānujñāṃ samādhādya cariṣye saugataṃ padaṃ /
XXsabhivpu:442: Svp_214 kṛpāya māṃ samāyujya saṃcārayitum arhati /
XXsabhivpu:443: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sa karuṇāmbudhiḥ //
XXsabhivpu:444: Svp_215 apamadaṃ parivrājaṃ taṃ samīkṣyaivam ādiśat /
XXsabhivpu:445: ehi bhadrāsti te vāṃcchā saugate saṃvare yadi //
XXsabhivpu:446: Svp_216 bodhicaryāṃ samādhāya niṣkleśaṃ saṃcara vrataṃ /
XXsabhivpu:447: ity ādiśya sa saṃbuddho dakṣiṇapāṇinā svayaṃ //
XXsabhivpu:448: Svp_217 śirasi saṃspṛśans tasya trikāyam abhyaśodhayat /
XXsabhivpu:449: bhagavatā śiraḥ spṛṣṭe muṇḍitaḥ sa jitendriyaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:456: Svp_*219* etad dṛṣṭvā samākarṇya sarve lokādhipā api /
XXsabhivpu:458: Svp_*22O* iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
XXsabhivpu:460: Svp_*221* śrutvedaṃ me 'numodanti sarve te nirmalendriyāḥ /
XXsabhivpu:462: Svp_*222* iti śāstrārhatādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā 'śoko nṛpo mudā /
